attributes.action: approve and set a timescale for the upgrading of the A9 inverness to perth trunk route
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A9 has long been recognised as a dangerous road, for a major connection route to the highlands and west coast traffic volumes are higher than is safe for what is predominantly single-carriage road.  Death rates on the road are well above the national average but would be cut by providing safer junctions and longer, more frequent sections of dual carraige to allow safer overtaking.  Local councils dismiss the option of fully dual-carraiged road as costly and time-sapping, but how is human life weighed against money/time?
